org.mini2Dx.core.di

Interface BeanUtils

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidBeanUtils, DesktopBeanUtils, IOSBeanUtils

    public interface BeanUtils
    Common interface for platform-dependent bean utility functions

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object cloneBean(java.lang.Object bean)
      Creates a deep copy of an Object

    • Method Detail

      • cloneBean

        java.lang.Object cloneBean(java.lang.Object bean)
                           throws MdxException
        Creates a deep copy of an Object
        Parameters:
        bean - The Object to copy
        Returns:
        A new instance of Object with all its properties copied
        Throws:
        MdxException - Thrown if an exception occurs during the copy
